{{cpp/chrono/zoned_time/title|1=get_info}}
{{cpp/chrono/zoned_time/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|1=
std::chrono::sys_info get_info() const;
}}

Obtains the {{lc|std::chrono::sys_info}} containing information about the time zone at the time point stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Return value===
{{c|zone-&gt;get_info(tp)}}, where {{tt|zone}} is the non-static data member holding the time zone pointer, and {{tt|tp}} is the non-static data member holding the stored time point (as a {{c|std::chrono::sys_time&lt;duration&gt;}}).
